recommendations.title: Downsize Compute Large VM
recommendations.description: Downsize the Compute Large VM to Compute Medium VM which will provide 4 vCPU, 16GB RAM for half the cost.
steps: Identify the unused resources in the Compute Large VM
Create a new Compute Medium VM with 4 vCPU, 16GB RAM
Migrate the workload to the new Compute Medium VM

recommendations.title: Migrate Managed SQL DB to Open Source
recommendations.description: Migrate the Managed SQL DB to an open source database solution like PostgreSQL.
steps: Identify the database schema and migrate it to PostgreSQL
Migrate the data from Managed SQL DB to PostgreSQL

recommendations.title: Use Open Source Object Storage
recommendations.description: Use an open source object storage solution like MinIO for storing logs.
steps: Configure MinIO for data replication and high availability
Migrate the logs from Object Storage Standard to MinIO

recommendations.title: Use a Load Balancer Alternative
recommendations.description: Use a load balancer alternative like HAProxy for load balancing.

recommendations.title: Downsize Block Storage HDD
recommendations.description: Downsize the Block Storage HDD to a smaller size to reduce storage costs.
steps: Identify the unused resources in the Block Storage HDD
Downsize the Block Storage HDD to a smaller size

recommendations.title: Use a CI/CD Pipeline Alternative
recommendations.description: Use a CI/CD pipeline alternative like Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment.
steps: Configure Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment

recommendations.title: Downsize CI/CD Pipeline
recommendations.description: Downsize the CI/CD pipeline to reduce costs.
steps: Identify the unused resources in the CI/CD pipeline
Downsize the CI/CD pipeline to a smaller size
